con:configuration.query: Select us_zipcodes.city as us_zipcodes_city, us_zipcodes.state as us_zipcodes_state, us_zipcodes.zipcode as us_zipcodes_zipcode From us_zipcodes Inner Join us_timezones On us_zipcodes.timezone = us_timezones.timezone Where us_timezones.timezone_abbrev = 'EST5EDT'
